HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: DPD: 99 Kč, Česká Pošta: 89 Kč. Zdarma pro objednávky nad 1 500 Kč.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: následující pracovní den (objednávky do 15:00 pro Českou poštu, do 17:00 pro DPD)

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: 59 Kč. Zdarma pro objednávky nad 1 500 Kč.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: 59 Kč. Zdarma pro objednávky nad 1 500 Kč.

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: Comfor.cz offers home delivery, pickup at parcel shops/lockers, and in-store pickup. PROVIDERS: Delivery partners include DPD, Česká pošta, and Zásilkovna, plus a network of over 150 COMFOR PARTNER stores for personal collection. PRICING: All delivery methods are free for orders over 1,500 Kč. For smaller orders, home delivery costs 89-99 Kč, and Zásilkovna pickup is 59 Kč. In-store pickup is always free. COD surcharges apply (29-35 Kč), except for in-store pickup. NOTABLE FEATURES: Standard home delivery is very fast, often arriving the next business day. Saturday home delivery is available. The Zásilkovna network provides access to over 7,000 pickup points, including 24/7 parcel lockers. No specific information is provided for bulky item delivery. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented clearly on a dedicated page ('Možnosti doručení'). A simple table effectively summarizes the costs for different providers and order values, making it easy for customers to understand their options. The information is comprehensive and easy to find.
